bl

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • bl.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Defines a task by a string and a boolean to indicate if the task is done or not (checked). There are some other possibilities for the future like a deadline or additional notes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
